data.actual_result: role filter is set to the role that was just created for the new bot (IF APPLICABLE)
data.expected_result: nothing happens; role filter remains at its existing setting
data.short_description: When in the Member Settings tab and a bot is added that makes its own role, role filter switches to the newly created role.
data.steps_to_repro: - Navigate to Server Settings > Members - Add a bot to server
